title: 10/10 Would hold hands with and cuddle and love dearly.
body: As a Shen main, when she gets live I'll ult her every time even if she is in the slightest danger. Call me a degenerate but I'll hold the shit out of her hand even if her nails pierce my skin. But seriously though, the designer team really did a beautiful job in hyping up a rework champion. You guys did awesome and I look forward to seeing her on the pbe. That is if she gets close enough <3.

replies.body: Can't wait to invade her bush and surpress her from behind while her team helplessly spams "GG FF 15 REPORT EVE PICKING EVE 2k17"
lol you monster. Hopefully my crappy lvl 1 ult will be enough to save her.

> [{quoted}](name=No Love For Shen,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=o3EiMhey,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-09-22T07:41:57.283+0000)
>
> lol you monster. Hopefully my crappy lvl 1 ult will be enough to save her.

<3 I got you Shen. There's 42 love points right there.
<3 thank you for the free Wit's End.
Great, Rioters encourage this type of behaviour and act like 12 years old twitter users to make their fans happy.
how about you take your art hateing but off the forums for awhile, like everything you've posted today has been pretty toxic and anti love.
I just hope I don't leave my shens to die like I usually have to do as eve after they TP in,  Oh eve, the 6 second in 10 second out champion lol

> [{quoted}](name=No Love For Shen,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=o3EiMhey,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-09-22T07:41:57.283+0000)
>
> you monster. 

That's one name for it. I like to refer to it as my "Warwick Snack".

How passionate.
Too bad that this love is onesided, since, you know.... No Love For Shen!
QwQ but muh boi needs it....  <\3
Yes you can be my savior all the time .... to bad i do not have a name suited for it but i am an eve main
I will buy all the CD runes and only ult you :D.

Ahh, see, Evelynn is already winning the war. This is the kind of behavoir she wants from her victims. Don't be fooled, come to your senses, your only reward if you continue down this path is death, no matter how many times you save her life. This in turn only strengthens her. Holding her hand could spell doom for generations to come.

We will stealth gank bot lane together and I'll ult her and taunt our enemies out of nowhere and she finishes them off. And even if we fail to kill, I'll take all the Ashe ults and caitlyn bullets for her to escape. Good job Rito for hyping up my favorite female jungled to partner with.
This is so... weirdly romantic, it's lovely xD

This is pretty creepy.... and sad.

You, I mean. Not that drawing.
